channel.title: How to add bonus to items?
channel.description:
I got Dragon Claws on my server. They works with spec but when I go in player equipment, it says Str = +0.
How can I change that to what I want ?
Thanks.

item.title: How to add bonus to items?
item.dc:creator: @G0dz_Tank G0dz Tank
item.description:
@G0dz_Tank wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:9, topic:297520”][quote author=jeddac link=topic=393552.msg2928595#msg2928595 date=1251147077]
it’s around 70 :p, somewhere from 64-88 or something, i know it has 1 less max hit than a d scim
[/quote]

But where do I add the 70 ?[/quote]

if 70 is the str bonus you put it as the 14th number or the 1 before the last…in items.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: How to add bonus to items?

item.title: How to add bonus to items?
item.dc:creator: @G0dz_Tank G0dz Tank
item.description:
@G0dz_Tank wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:5, topic:297520”]I know how to change bonus in item.cfg…

I just want to know the real Dragon Claws bonus for 317.[/quote]

Rofl go on runescape and borrow some dclaws eqip em and write down the bonuses LOL
i mean ur post was asking us how to change it to what u want not the actual bonuses :0

Read full topic

item.title: How to add bonus to items?
item.dc:creator: @Brennan_The_Great Brennan The Great
item.description:
@Brennan_The_Great wrote:

[quote=“G0dz Tank, post:4, topic:297520”][quote author=Maximum ZxZ link=topic=393552.msg2928554#msg2928554 date=1251145756]
I got Dragon Claws on my server. They works with spec but when I go in player equipment, it says Str = +0.

How can I change that to what I want ?

Thanks.
[/quote]
Its really easy to change the stats but becareful i tried to change stats to then i got this messed up error i cant fix :\

to change the stat bonuses go to items.cfg press ctrl + f and type in the code of your dclaws when u get their theirs a bunch of numbers next to it the 14th number is the str bonus so change the str bonus to w.e you want if u want u can mess around with the other numbers but NOT the 1st 3 that are like 120000 120000 1200000 dont change those >.>
WARNING MAKE A BACKUP FILE BEFORE DOING ANYTHING :([/quote]

14th number or the one before the last ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 02:41:17 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:5, topic:297520”]I know how to change bonus in item.cfg…

I just want to know the real Dragon Claws bonus for 317.[/quote]
Oh… You could just look it up on RS in the GE i think…

Read full topic

item.title: How to add bonus to items?
item.dc:creator: @G0dz_Tank G0dz Tank
item.description:
@G0dz_Tank wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:1, topic:297520”]I got Dragon Claws on my server. They works with spec but when I go in player equipment, it says Str = +0.

How can I change that to what I want ?

Thanks.[/quote]
Its really easy to change the stats but becareful i tried to change stats to then i got this messed up error i cant fix :\

to change the stat bonuses go to items.cfg press ctrl + f and type in the code of your dclaws when u get their theirs a bunch of numbers next to it the 14th number is the str bonus so change the str bonus to w.e you want if u want u can mess around with the other numbers but NOT the 1st 3 that are like 120000 120000 1200000 dont change those >.>
WARNING MAKE A BACKUP FILE BEFORE DOING ANYTHING

Read full topic

item.title: How to add bonus to items?
item.dc:creator: @Brennan_The_Great Brennan The Great
item.description:
@Brennan_The_Great wrote:

Sp3ke:

You change item bonuses in item.cfg

Just search for “Dragon_Claws” or the Item ID. Either should come out with it.

Read full topic
